job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtSkycart is currently looking for a Software Development Engineer to join our team ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWere a drone hardwaresoftware and logistics company currently working on COVID19 vaccine and other medical supply deliveries ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWere looking to expand to lastmile ecommerce deliveries globally throughout the next several yearsampnbspWere in the process of a funding round right now on a platform called Wefunder and weve had a decent amount of investment from a few angels already without ever launching publiclyampnbspThe compensation to start off for this role will be in equity shares however given that is a parttime role you are welcome to be working in an external role to SkycartampnbspIf this sounds interesting to you go ahead and drop your resume in the chat and our Head of Software Stephen Enright will proceed with the next stepsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtFullstack app development experience is a plusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtWorked on mobile appsltligtltligtWorked on backend cloud softwareltligtltligtExperience with drones preferableltligtltligtWorked on relevant projects ltligtltligtMust know Go or golang Java React and Android developmentltligtltligtKnowledge in CCC Python Golang GO Java REST API Android development kit React Flutter Elastic Search Microservices Securityltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
